headings.usage: Use for all H1-H6. Tracking tight (-0.02em).

colors.palette_strategy: Void Black Base + Brand Orange Action + Electric Purple Glow
usage_rules: Background must be ALMOST black (#0A0A0A), never pure black.
Primary Color (Orange #FF5722) is for CTAs and Key Highlights ONLY.
Secondary Color (Purple #7C3AED) is for ambient glows, glass borders, and decorative elements.
Glassmorphism: Use bg-white/5 or bg-black/40 with backdrop-blur-xl and border-white/10.

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous. Use py-24 or py-32 for section spacing.
layout_strategy.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A) for Services and Features.

hero_section.background: Radial gradient glow (Purple/Orange) behind the glass card.

buttons.primary: bg-primary hover:bg-primary/90 text-white rounded-full shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(255,87,34,0.5)] transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 hover:bg-white/10 text-white rounded-full backdrop-blur-md

cards.classes: bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-lg border border-white/10 rounded-2xl hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300

form_container.classes: bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-3xl p-8 shadow-2xl relative overflow-hidden

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use 'bg-gradient-to-r from-orange-500 to-purple-600' for text clips (bg-clip-text).
visual_enhancers.textures: Add a fixed 'noise' overlay div with opacity-5 pointer-events-none z-50.
visual_enhancers.glows: Use absolute positioned divs with blur-3xl and opacity-30 behind key elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE CSS VARIABLES: Replace the content of 'src/index.css' with the variables provided in 'colors.css_variables'.
2. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'src/index.css' or 'public/index.html'.
3. CREATE COMPONENTS: Build 'GlassCard', 'GlowingButton', 'SectionHeader' as reusable components.

4. GHL WIDGET: Embed the form widget inside a 'GlassCard' container. Use an iframe with width='100%' and height='600px' (adjust as needed). URL: https://link.tesseractcrm.com/widget/form/iFOzCNyLBErzA4PTRZld
5. BOOKING LINK: The 'Book Audit' button must open: https://link.tesseractcrm.com/widget/booking/VuCHnV26sXlp8qy9DiVG
6. LANGUAGE TOGGLE: Implement a simple state (TR/EN) that switches text content. Default to TR.
7. ANIMATIONS: Use 'framer-motion' for scroll reveals. All sections should fade-in-up.
8. DARK MODE: Force dark mode by adding 'dark' class to the html/body tag or ensuring the theme provider defaults to dark.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attributes.
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds, use #050505 or #0A0A0A.
